title: Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black (Packaging May Vary)
descriptions:
### Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black

**Effortless Brewing, Breathtaking Flavors**

Elevate your coffee experience with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, a sleek and efficient appliance that fits seamlessly into any modern kitchen. Whether you're a coffee connoisseur or just starting your caffeine journey, this compact coffee maker delivers exceptional convenience and flavor in every cup.

**Key Features:**

- **Customizable Brew Sizes:** Choose from 6, 8, or 10-ounce servings to perfectly match your mood and cup size.
- **Ultra-Fast Brewing:** Enjoy a perfectly brewed cup of coffee in under a minute, ensuring you're always ready to start your day with a delicious, steaming cup.
- **36-Ounce Removable Water Reservoir:** The large, easy-to-fill reservoir means fewer refills, making your morning routine even smoother.
- **Smart Start Technology:** With the touch of a button, your coffee maker is ready to brew, no preheating required.
- **Energy Efficient:** The K-Compact automatically turns off after 2 hours to save energy and ensure your appliance remains safe and efficient.
- **Removable Drip Tray:** The drip tray is designed to accommodate travel mugs up to 7 inches tall and can hold a full accidental brew, ensuring no mess and easy cleanup.
- **Hot Water Dispense:** Need a quick cup of tea or soup? The Keurig K-Compact also dispenses hot water, making it versatile for more than just coffee.
- **Compact Design:** With a width of just 8 inches, this coffee maker fits easily on your countertop without taking up valuable space.
- **Compatible with K-Cup Pods and My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter:** Enjoy a wide variety of flavors from your favorite brands or use your own coffee with the Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter.

**Why Choose the Keurig K-Compact?**

- **Convenience:** Quick brewing, easy operation, and a compact design make this coffee maker perfect for busy mornings.
- **Quality:** Consistently delicious cups of coffee every time, thanks to Keurig's trusted brewing technology.
- **Versatility:** Whether you're a fan of strong, bold flavors or prefer a lighter, smoother brew, the K-Compact has you covered.
- **Style:** The sleek black finish adds a touch of modern elegance to your kitchen.

**Packaging May Vary:** The appearance of the packaging may differ from the images shown, but the high-quality performance and features remain the same.

**Upgrade Your Coffee Game Today!**

Experience the perfect blend of style, functionality, and convenience with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. Order yours now and start your day with a cup of coffee thatâ€™s as good as it gets.
